name: Space Co-op Qwop in a Coffee Shop
name_original: Space Co-op Qwop in a Coffee Shop
description:
Zero gravity is difficult. It's even harder when you haven't had your morning coffee yet.

You'll have to navigate this Regular Earth Coffee Shop in order to complete your list of daily chores. Do try not to cause *too* much havoc now, won't you?

Play alone, or with friends; pilot your astronaut solo, or take control of one thruster each and work as a team.

Controls:

  • W/S/A/D : Thrusters
  • Q/E : Grab/release objects
  • H: Toggle helmet cam
  • Tab: See objectives list

Credits:

Made in two days as part of Global Game Jam 2018, in Guildford Library, by:

  • Liam de Valmency
  • Lucho Hubanov
  • Nele Steenput
  • Ian Zell
  • Lana Zgombic
  • Holley Gray
